channel.title: StatPhysNE on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in StatPhysNE on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: StatPhysNE
item.description: Statistical physics far from equilibrium (T) - StatPhysNE Course Statistical physics far from equilibrium (T) Course No. StatPhysNE Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 4+2 8 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Advanced statistical mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Understanding the generic behavior of fluctuation-dominated systems far from equilibrium, and acquaintance with the basic mathematical tools used for their description.
